articles.title: US bomb cyclone: At least 50 dead as North America gripped by devastating winter storm - Sky News
articles.content:
At least 50 deaths have been linked to a severe storm that continues to batter the US and Canada.
The US has recorded 46 of the deaths, with a further four dead after a bus rolled over on icy roads … [+2465 chars]

articles.title: 5 arrested in deadly shooting at Minnesota's Mall of America - CP24
articles.description: Five people were arrested in the fatal shooting of a 19-year-old man at the Mall of America that sent the sprawling commercial center into lockdown on one of the final days of the holiday shopping season, police said Saturday.

articles.description: The cofounder and former CEO of collapsed crypto trading platform FTX was spotted at JFK airport on Thursday before flying to his parents' home.
